verses.verse: Send <S%H7971><s%> ye the lamb <S%H3733><s%> to the ruler <S%H4910><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from Sela <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5554><s%> to the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

For it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that, as a wandering <S%H5074><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> cast out <S%H7971><s%> of the nest, <S%H7064><s%> so the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> at the fords <S%H4569><s%> of Arnon. <S%H769><s%>

Take <S%H935><s%> counsel, <S%H6098><s%> execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment; <S%H6415><s%> make <S%H7896><s%> thy shadow <S%H6738><s%> as the night <S%H3915><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the noonday; <S%H6672><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> the outcasts; <S%H5080><s%> betray <S%H1540><s%> not <S%H408><s%> him that wandereth. <S%H5074><s%>

Let mine outcasts <S%H5080><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> with thee, Moab; <S%H4124><s%> be <S%H1933><s%> thou a covert <S%H5643><s%> to them from the face <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the spoiler: <S%H7703><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the extortioner <S%H4160><s%> is at an end, <S%H656><s%> the spoiler <S%H7701><s%> ceaseth, <S%H3615><s%> the oppressors <S%H7429><s%> are consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And in mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall the throne <S%H3678><s%> be established: <S%H3559><s%> and he shall sit <S%H3427><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it in truth <S%H571><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> judging, <S%H8199><s%> and seeking <S%H1875><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and hasting <S%H4106><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab; <S%H4124><s%> he is very <S%H3966><s%> proud: <S%H1341><s%> even of his haughtiness, <S%H1346><s%> and his pride, <S%H1347><s%> and his wrath: <S%H5678><s%> but his lies <S%H907><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be so. <S%H3651><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall Moab <S%H4124><s%> howl <S%H3213><s%> for Moab, <S%H4124><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> shall howl: <S%H3213><s%> for the foundations <S%H808><s%> of Kir-hareseth <S%H7025><s%> shall ye mourn; <S%H1897><s%> surely <S%H389><s%> they are stricken. <S%H5218><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> languish, <S%H535><s%> and the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah: <S%H7643><s%> the lords <S%H1167><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> have broken down <S%H1986><s%> the principal plants <S%H8291><s%> thereof, they are come <S%H5060><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> they wandered <S%H8582><s%> through the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> her branches <S%H7976><s%> are stretched out, <S%H5203><s%> they are gone over <S%H5674><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will bewail <S%H1058><s%> with the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%> the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah: <S%H7643><s%> I will water <S%H7301><s%> thee with my tears, <S%H1832><s%> O Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh: <S%H500><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the shouting <S%H1959><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thy summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> thy harvest <S%H7105><s%> is fallen. <S%H5307><s%>

And gladness <S%H8057><s%> is taken away, <S%H622><s%> and joy <S%H1524><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the plentiful field; <S%H3759><s%> and in the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> singing, <S%H7442><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be shouting: <S%H7321><s%> the treaders <S%H1869><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> out no <S%H3808><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in their presses; <S%H3342><s%> I have made their vintage shouting <S%H1959><s%> to cease. <S%H7673><s%>

Wherefore <S%H921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> my bowels <S%H4578><s%> shall sound <S%H1993><s%> like a harp <S%H3658><s%> for Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and mine inward parts <S%H7130><s%> for Kir-haresh. <S%H7025><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it is seen <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> is weary <S%H3811><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the high place, <S%H1116><s%> that he shall come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to pray; <S%H6419><s%> but he shall not <S%H3808><s%> prevail. <S%H3201><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> since that time. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227><s%>

But now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Within three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> as the years <S%H8141><s%> of a hireling, <S%H7916><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be contemned, <S%H7034><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> that great <S%H7227><s%> multitude; <S%H1995><s%> and the remnant <S%H7605><s%> shall be very small <S%H4592><s%> <S%H4213><s%> and feeble. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3524><s%>
